message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would be a significant asset to your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate, tailored specifically to meet your needs.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I recognize the value of your product, $1,350,000 is unfortunately above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for it, which still represents a significant profit for you. Let me know your thoughts.
